resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance Study courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time W2 employment).

Language: .NET/C#, Java, JavaScript 
Frameworks/web: .NET/Core, Spring, Hibernate
Microservices/Cloud: Docker,Kafka/AWS 
Databases: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, DynamoDB 
Tools: Microsoft Visual Studio, VS Code, IntelliJ, Eclipse Maven, Git, GitHub, Postman, Docker, JIRA, StarUML 
 Web and Application Servers: IIS, Tomcat, Apache 
 Design Patterns: MVC, Factory Method, Façade, Singleton, Observer, Strategy, Adapter, Template 
 SDLC: Waterfall, Agile/Scrum 
 Platforms: Windows, Linux

Diligent Software Engineer with 9 years of professional IT experience including latest 6 years of experience streamlining frontend and backend development for complex software systems. Proven experience contributing to all phases of software development life cycle including design, testing, debugging, implementation, and academic knowledge of Java. Adept and personable communicator with experience leading technical and cross-functional teams. Skilled in using technologies such as .NET, C#, MySQL, SQL Server, RESTful Web Services, and AWS Cloud.

Description: I am a full-stack developer having 9 years of experience in different business domains like manufacturing, distribution business, and automobile industries. I have a strong technical background in C#/.NET, and relational databases like MySQL, SQL Server, AWS cloud, React, HTML, CSS, WebAPI etc. I looking for a full-time role under W-2. Regards, Puskar Budhathoki LinkedIn Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/puskar-budhathoki/
